com.jcabi.github

Interface RepoCommits

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonReadable

    @Immutable
public interface RepoCommits
extends JsonReadable
    Commits of a Github repository.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Alexander Sinyagin (sinyagin.alexander@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Commits API
